critique: This executive order defines sex as immutable and biological, explicitly excluding gender identity. It directs federal agencies to enforce sex-based distinctions, revise policies to reflect this definition, and cease funding or promoting 'gender ideology'. It also addresses privacy in intimate spaces and aims to protect single-sex spaces. The order rescinds previous executive orders and guidance documents related to transgender equality. This indicates a strong stance against transgender rights and a focus on traditional definitions of sex and gender.
